mapper.select:
SELECT material_id, serial_no, ocm, direct_flg, service_repair_flg, CASE WHEN temp_fact_recept >= 1 THEN null WHEN ocm = 4 THEN f_addworkdays(reception_time,2) ELSE f_addworkdays(reception_time,1) END AS expect_arrive_time, model_name, category_id, (select kind from category where category_id = temp.category_id) as kind, temp_fact_recept AS fact_recept, tag_types, location As tc_location, ocm_rank, comment FROM ( SELECT material.material_id, material.serial_no, material.ocm, material.ocm_rank, material.direct_flg, material.service_repair_flg, material.reception_time, mdl.name AS model_name, mdl.CATEGORY_ID, coalesce(SUM(afpf.production_type = 102) > 0, 0) AS temp_fact_recept, SUM(tag.tag_type = 2) AS waiting_leak, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tag.tag_type) AS tag_types, tcs.location, cmt.comment FROM material JOIN model mdl ON material.model_id = mdl.model_id LEFT JOIN fact_material fct ON material.material_id = fct.material_id LEFT JOIN af_production_feature afpf ON fct.af_pf_key = afpf.af_pf_key LEFT JOIN material_tag tag ON material.material_id = tag.material_id LEFT JOIN material_comment cmt ON material.material_id = cmt.material_id AND cmt.operator_id = 00000000002 LEFT JOIN turnover_case_storage tcs on material.material_id = tcs.material_id WHERE fix_type IN (1 , 2) AND break_back_flg = 0 AND inline_time IS NULL AND wip_date IS NULL AND outline_time IS NULL
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM production_feature WHERE material_id = material.material_id AND position_id IN (10 , 11) AND operate_result not in (0, 5))
GROUP BY material.material_id
HAVING (temp_fact_recept = 0 OR waiting_leak > 0)
ORDER BY model_name,serial_no ) temp
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fact_recept_material_temp ( direct_flg, serial_no, model_id, model_name, af_pf_key, tag_types, tc_location, reception_time ) VALUES ( #{direct_flg}, #{serial_no}, #{model_id}, #{model_name}, #{af_pf_key}, #{tag_types}, #{tc_location}, current_timestamp )
mapper.select: SELECT material.material_id, material.serial_no, mdl.name AS model_name, (select kind from category where category_id = mdl.category_id) as kind, 1 AS temp_fact_recept, 1 AS fact_recept, (select position_id from production_feature where material_id = material.material_id and position_id in (10, 11) limit 1) as tag_types FROM material JOIN model mdl ON material.model_id = mdl.model_id WHERE fix_type = 3 AND break_back_flg = 0 AND outline_time IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM production_feature WHERE material_id = material.material_id AND position_id IN (10 , 11) AND operate_result not in (0, 5)) ORDER BY model_name, serial_no
mapper.update: UPDATE fact_recept_material_temp SET serial_no = #{serial_no}, model_id = #{model_id}, model_name = #{model_name}, tag_types = #{tag_types}, tc_location = #{tc_location} WHERE fact_recept_id = #{fact_recept_id}
mapper.select: SELECT fact_recept_id, direct_flg, serial_no, model_id, model_name, af_pf_key, tag_types, tc_location, reception_time FROM fact_recept_material_temp WHERE fact_recept_id = #{fact_recept_id}
